body_html: An alternative to "queuerunnerbase" is to implement it as new object and use duck typing to make it work with tensorflow serialization. The amount of stuff in QueueRunner is quite small, I'm not sure if it's worth using inheritance as opposed to "copy paste the needed bits"
body_text: An alternative to "queuerunnerbase" is to implement it as new object and use duck typing to make it work with tensorflow serialization. The amount of stuff in QueueRunner is quite small, I'm not sure if it's worth using inheritance as opposed to "copy paste the needed bits"
body: An alternative to "queuerunnerbase" is to implement it as new object and use duck typing to make it work with tensorflow serialization. The amount of stuff in QueueRunner is quite small, I'm not sure if it's worth using inheritance as opposed to "copy paste the needed bits"
